Links: Full-time to the Colorado Connection System .
Notes: At 13,685;, it is one of the highest 2-meter repeaters in North America. January 2021 - This repeater has been on and off the air intermittently due to solar/battery issues, check sponsor website for latest
Nets: Central Colorado Traffic Net: Daily at 19:30. Colorado Connection Net (all welcome): Thu at 20:00. Statewide ARES: Sun at 20:00.
